lead_paragraph: A group of former officials in Britain makes an appeal to the U.S. Congress, urging support for the agreement with Iran.

headline.main: 10 Prominent Britons Back the Iran Nuclear Deal
headline.print_headline: 10 Prominent Britons Back the Iran Nuclear Deal

snippet: A group of former officials in Britain makes an appeal to the U.S. Congress, urging support for the agreement with Iran.
